entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
